sub_title: Data Analytics & Data Science at C.H. Robinson
summary:
I'm passionate about learning and deriving information from data. As a self-taught developer through online programming classes, I've shaped my career to focus on how to best shape data and use it securely for insights and business value. I'm continuing my learning with data science and the most modern technologies to be on the cutting edge of applying what I know.

• Passionate Learner • Self-starter • Analytics and Data Science • Strong Communication and Interpersonal Skills • Open-minded • Multi-lingual • Ultra Marathon Trail Runner • Passion to Serve People and the Planet

"To achieve all that is possible, we must attempt the impossible. To be as much as we can be, we must dream of being more."

awards.title: Member of Beta Gamma Sigma International Honor Society
awards.description: Beta Gamma Sigma is the international honor society serving business programs accredited by AACSB International - The Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business. Membership in Beta Gamma Sigma is the highest recognition a business student anywhere in the world can receive in a business program accredited by AACSB International. (http://www.betagammasigma.org/)
awards.issuer: Bradley University Beta Gamma Sigma Chapter

awards.title: 4th Annual Hult Prize 2013 Global Case Challenge
awards.description:

• Qualified with the top world universities such as MIT, Stanford University,University of Michigan, Tel –Aviv, and University of Hong Kong, Indian Institute of Technology – Kharagpur
• Led the team presenting solution to eradicate food insecurity in urban slums by 2018

awards.title: Member of  Phi Kappa Phi National Honor Society
awards.description: Founded in 1897 at the University of Maine, Phi Kappa Phi is the nation's oldest, largest, and most selective collegiate honor society.Phi Kappa Phi is much more than an emblem and a line on a résumé. It is a global network comprised of the best and brightest from all academic disciplines  Graduate students must rank in the upper 10 percent of their class to be eligible. For more information, visit http://www.phikappaphi.org/web/.

projects.title: Sustainability Report and Recommendation for Bradley University
projects.description:
I collaborated on an independent study course which resulted in the University's first Sustainability Report and recommendations to improve execution on the school's 5-year strategic plan through enhanced sustainability performance.

• 1st Report and Recommendations for University written together with Dan Dugal
• Report based on GRI Guidelines and extensive university surveys
• Highlighted at Bradley University 2012 Student Scholarship Exposition
• Spotlighted in local magazine (InterBusiness Issues, Sept 2012, Peoriamagazines.com, available at http://www.peoriamagazines.com/ibi/2012/sep/sustainability-practice-bradley-university)

Professor of Management at Bradley University

profile_positions.description:
• Creating, maintaining, and administering SQL data lakes with flattened tables to create specific data sets and
business metrics as the source for multiple reports and applications
• Collaborating with data engineers to move our data lakes into cloud-based data warehouse solution (Snowflake)
• Training and guiding team members in their projects and providing supervision and optimization to their SQL code and logic
• Translating complex internal and external customer requirements into advanced and dynamic reporting solutions
profile_positions.title: Senior Data Analyst

profile_positions.description:
• Designed and built flexible, user interactive web application dashboard using R Shiny (ShinyProxy)
• Worked with data science team to administer the app using Docker container via Dockerfiles and Makefiles
• Created complex, on-time performance reporting based on data mined from multiple data sources to make dynamic performance analysis depending on user-defined variables in real-time
• Visualized internal and external on-time performance KPI dashboards in Power BI Cloud supported by multiple operational reports built in Visual Studio SSRS
• Identified context and root cause-analysis of categorizations made by the system to help derive business value from information
• Learned with a data science team to administer pricing tools using Docker and maintaining automations within Dockerfiles, Makefiles, and scripting in R and Python
• Automated tasks, projects, and communication with Power Automate flows to connect Azure Boards, Excel, and Microsoft Teams using Adaptive Cards to notify users with specific triggers
• Written documentation in GitHub and DokuWiki to share and distribute source code, attribute definitions, and logic
• Built data security using the Principle of Least Privilege (POLP) to be applied in Power BI via Row-Level Security, in SSRS via Shared Datasets, and in R Shiny apps
• Created SSRS data-driven subscriptions to distribute dashboards and reports with varying subscribers based on dynamic criteria to determine the set of users
• Trained new-hires on advanced SQL techniques for use in business-specific scenarios
profile_positions.title: Analytical Consultant

profile_positions.description:
• Translated complex internal and external customer requirements into dashboards and reports
• Extracted data using SQL on daily basis from multiple databases for data analytics and reporting
• Developed data visualization with tools such as Power BI, Power Pivot (DAX), and Visual Studio (SSRS)
• Defined business KPIs and metrics to enable data-driven business decisions for leadership
• Performed data cleansing with Excel, VBA, Python, and SQL, including validation, value correction, and handling missing data
• Interpreted data and performing data analytics to accelerate growth and provide relevant data to decision makers
• Analyzed process improvement with BizTech to drive efficiencies and increase productivity
• Prioritized and delivering ad hoc business requests from sales representatives to directors
profile_positions.title: Business & Data Analyst

profile_positions.description:
• Performing and updating business analytics for strategic decision making and key performance indicators
• Collecting raw data to build specific reports for growth, industry verticals, regional and commodity performance
• Developing reporting tools for internal and external metrics and trending
• Data cleaning to combine data from multiple sources to represent correlation of data points and trends
• Data visualization for various audiences focused on different key indicators and growth criteria
• Dashboards to show quick status reports and growth metrics for executives and top leadership
• Improving efficiencies and reducing operational costs through technology and custom application design and implementation
• Designing and building in Excel VBA customer communication tools integrated with Outlook to perform multiple functions
• Iterating on previous Microsoft Access order tracking application to re-deploy it in Microsoft SQL in order to increase stability and volume handling
• Leading the Carbon Neutral Travel Program for the entire European network as the CSR Ambassador 
• Setting standard operational procedures to improve the business processes and time management 
• Owning legal compliance related to European Union Value Added Tax (VAT) regulations
• Generating business by cultivating new relationship and building important customer accounts 
• Managing oversight and administration of customer accounts and setting annual client budgets
• Expanding and growing sourcing of C.H. Robinson business in Europe
• Training new employees and interfacing with different branches on new technologies and custom tools
• Led and mentored team of eight interns for internal case competition placing in the top five out of 22 teams
